reviews.review_msg: Clear as mud...will give you 10 pgs of instructions with every page contradicting the others.  Marks hard for not being able to read her mind...apparently following the muddy instructions isn't the route to take. In the end, I had to have a friend who is an Accountant teach me the course since the professor was useless.

Going to class was a waste of time.  She used class time to mark assignments.  Wouldn't listen to student commentary.  Kept talking about the "real world" when I don't think she's lived in the "real world".
boxes and thinking outside of them
